description:
cmd/vet: fix test file's package, to not confuse godoc

Otherwise godoc at /cmd/ shows vet's package summary as
being this test file's bogus build tag.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
LGTM as long as 'make test' still says ok.

This CL doesn't change the result or output of "make test" or "make
test_notypes".

That said, both "make test" and "make test_notypes" both currently fail
because they've bitrot and nobody's paying attention, since they're not
part of all.bash.

Do you want to fix that?  You can fix this issue at the same time if you'd
like.



On Wed, Apr 24, 2013 at 9:11 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM as long as 'make test' still says ok.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8938043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8938043/>
>

roger wilco


On Wed, Apr 24, 2013 at 9:15 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
> This CL doesn't change the result or output of "make test" or "make
> test_notypes".
>
> That said, both "make test" and "make test_notypes" both currently fail
> because they've bitrot and nobody's paying attention, since they're not part
> of all.bash.
>
> Do you want to fix that?  You can fix this issue at the same time if you'd
> like.
>
>
>
> On Wed, Apr 24, 2013 at 9:11 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:
>>
>> LGTM as long as 'make test' still says ok.
>>
>> https://codereview.appspot.com/8938043/
>
>

subject: code review 8938043: cmd/vet: fix test file's package, to not confuse godoc
